response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I am extending to you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $750,000. I believe this is an exceptional offer considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
